snippet: Craigslist dropped a provision that asserted an exclusive license to users' posts, Adam Yauch's will, and the Mars rover has nearly a million Twitter followers.
abstract: Craigslist dropped a provision that asserted an exclusive license to users' posts, Adam Yauch's will, and the Mars rover has nearly a million Twitter followers.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Craiglist Relents on Owning Posts, and a Chatty Mars Rover
